name: Youth Organisation ALEXIS Prilep
goal:
Mission

Our mission is the social and psychological well-being in education through lifelong learning.

Work

Our work aims to facilitate the personal, social and educational development of citizens for continuous learning and professional accountability.
interests: Budget, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives: We use non-formal learning methods such as self-confidence techniques to strengthen the working capacity of educators and counselors and promote access to specialised dialogue as a tool for addressing learning issues.
